amendment.description: At the end of division E (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. Each amount made available by this division (other than an amount required to be made available by a provision of law) is hereby reduced by 4.6 percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 244 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to decrease funds made available to division E by 4.6 percent.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A086) Failed by recorded vote: 145 - 273 (Roll no. 402).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A086) Failed by recorded vote: 145 - 273 (Roll no. 402).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A086) offered by Mr. Grothman.
